headline: Jim Cramer Backs Mondelez (MDLZ) Despite Cost Pressures – Snacks Still Strong!
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer Looked At These 23 Stocks Recently. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Mondelez International, Inc. (NASDAQ:MDLZ) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer looked at recently. Jim Cramer, the host of Mad Money, offered an optimistic perspective on the market on […]
